newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Karachi port handles 40,907 tonnes cargo.
newsitem.headline: Karachi port handles 40,907 tonnes cargo.

text.p: Pakistan's Karachi Port Trust said it had handled 40,094 tonnes of export and import cargo in the 24 hours to 7 a.m. (0200 GMT) on Tuesday, compared to 64,441 tonnes on Monday.
In the past 24 hours, four ships sailed and six berthed. In the next 24 hours, six ships are expected to sail and five to arrive.
